Title(s): On the Five Joys of the Virgin Mary
_description: On the Five Joys of the Virgin Mary — seven 8-line stanzas

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Leuedy for þare blisseþat þu heddest at þe
                    triuneÞo þu wistest myd i wisseþat ihesu wolde beo
                    þi sune…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…O vre sunnes make vs clene& yef vs þat eche
                    lyhtAnd to heouene vs alle i menelouerd þu bryng for wel þu
                    miht
OxfJesus29.Attributed Title:
Her bigynneþ þe Vif Blyssen of vre leuedi Seynte Marie (f.
                    181)
